# my-important-info
In this repo i use to store my Important Information
everything in this is/should encrypted with RSA having 4096 bit key

**If you able to decrypt it, contact me first, i've something for you**



## instruction for awais(me)
 - every new data should be encrypted via RSA using public key
 - each chunck of data should be seperated
 - check always if any new RSA vulnerability is discovered or not
